long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple application that turns the YouTube search bar on and off when you just want to enjoy your video in a corner of your screen while doing other tasks. Very useful when you use it together with the "Open as window" option.
